jparsec.graph

Class SimpleChartElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.graph.SimpleChartElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SimpleChartElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Creates a simple chart element for JFreeChart.

    In this object the labels for x and y axes, as well as the title can be encoded following the instructions given in TextLabel class. This provides some possibilities like to dynamically change color/size, include superscript or subscript text, or Greek letters.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        y_label - Label y axis.
        legend - Legend.
        show_legend - True to show legend.
        change_orientation - True to change orientation.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If the chart type and subtype are incompatible.
